remarks: A function mapping all but one arguments to zero is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 8-Jul-2019.)
statement:
sniffsupp.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
sniffsupp.0 $e |- ( ph -> .0. e. W ) $.
sniffsupp.f $e |- F = ( x e. I |-> if ( x = X , A , .0. ) ) $.
sniffsupp $p |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d I x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
